EmailTemplate.subject: RSVP for the Welcome Reception and a Chance to Win $100 Gift Card
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
RSVP - TriCON Welcome Reception Tuesday, September 13 l Boston, Massachusetts
Nothing is more welcoming than a friendly face and the opportunity to relax on a comfortable couch-- while enjoying a hosted beverage (or two). Come meet friends, old and new at the first networking event of TriCON--sponsored by PCS Mobile and digiTICKET.
What: Welcome Reception
When: Tuesday, September 13
5 PM - 7 PM for beverages and light snacks 8:30 PM - 11 PM for after-dinner beverages
Where: Presidential Suite of Boston Park Plaza on the 15th floor, widely considered to be the most elegant and lavish suite in the entire Northeast
How: Please register in advance to ensure access to this exclusive event since the 15th Floor is not openly accessible to hotel guests.
For details and more information, visit: http://www.pcsmobile.com/Tricon2011/WelcomeReception.aspx
Win $100 Visa Gift Card
Stop by the Welcome Reception to receive a key.
Bring it to Booth #22 during TriCON Exhibit Hall hours to see if you key will open the "Key to Mobility" Treasure Chest to win a $100 Visa Gift Card.
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
